item.title: Congressional hearing probes misconduct claims in Long Beach, LA immigration raids
item.description:
“What is happening in my city is not immigration enforcement,” Mayor Rex Richardson testified. “It is state-sponsored intimidation, targeting families, workers, entire neighborhoods through discriminatory profiling, unconstitutional stops and acts of violence.”

The post Congressional hearing probes misconduct claims in Long Beach, LA immigration raids appeared first on Long Beach Post News.
item.source:markdown:
![](https://img.lbpost.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2025/11/24135828/3w3a8-501968-axc14hlh-199456-r9VnzmPb-1024x683.jpg)
